name: optionalAI (Style embedding)
description:
This is a more artistic style embedding, that is inspired by the work of OptionalTypo. It's a rather simplistic Anime style inversion, but with a colorful twist in most parts.

Also check out my other embeddings here.

Trained on waifu-diffusion-v1-3-float32.ckpt, but works best when used in connection with DreamShaper 3.3 or Protogen 3.3 (Anime). Others may give you different results, but nevertheless it's sometimes very refreshing what comes out of the process.

I usually used Anything-V3.0 VAE - or vae-ft-mse-840000-ema-pruned works fine, too. I also use the negative embedding named Deep Negative from time to time. So take a good look into my examples for that. And yes, it's also compatible with lewd stuff.

The keyword is the filename (without the .pt) you put into your embeddings folder (usually optional_styleAI).

modelVersions.description:
Initial release.

Dataset images: 20
Model used: waifu-diffusion-v1-3-float32.ckpt
Number of vectors: 8
Batch size: 10
Gradient steps: 2
Learning rate: 0.005
Steps: 590
Latent sampling method: once
